item.description:
Mandarin Conversation group Meetup.

2nd and 4th Monday meetings to practice Mandarin conversation. Learners of all levels, and native speakers welcome!
This is an opportunity to meet with other learners and practice whatever you'd like to work on. Bring any books or homework you would like to review, and ask a native speaker to help you with pronounciation.


IMPORTANT NOTE:
PLEASE READ!!
This month we will be going out to eat since BCNC is closed for Columbus Day. All are welcome.

Remember to bring money for food.
------------

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Chinese Language (2nd Monday) October Meetup
